column2:
"No matter what you do, ability is key. Everybody knows that, and as an ARKS op,
you should know that too."

"So let's start off with a test to see what you
can do. But remember, I'm an ARKS op, too,
so I can spot a half-assed attempt a mile away."

"We'll talk again if you complete my request,
but I'm not holding my breath."
